word_mean: 大气中的强放电现象。按其发生的部位，可分为云中、云间或云地之间三种放电。

sentence.Network_en: It was unbelievably dramatic as lightning crackled all round the van.
sentence.Network_cn: 闪电在货车周围炸开时，情景异常壮观。

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly a bolt of lightning crackled through the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然一道闪电划破长空。

sentence.Network_en: There was frequent thunder and lightning, and torrential rain.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 闪电宝石：将五枚宝石排成一行(一列)可以将宝石聚合成能量更强的闪电(Lightning)宝石。当闪电宝石被引爆时，它将向上下左右射出 …
雷电（lightning）是大气中的强放电现象，也是一种静电现象。在积雨云中，小水滴、冰晶等运动、摩擦、撞击剧烈，致使其带大量电 …
不死之灵_百度百科 ... 头盖骨风暴（ Skull Storm） 闪电术（lightning）（ Lightning） 左轮的手枪（ Revolver）.
大学英语四级考试大纲(L)|英语四级词汇 ... lightly ad. 轻轻地，轻松地 lightning n. 闪电，闪电放电 like prep. 像，如；像要.

list.abs: 和上集一样,由欧文·威尔逊配音的主角“闪电麦昆”(Lightning McQueen)依然要参加各种赛车比赛,不过这次他将跨出美国国门、周游世界。

phrase.cizu_name: lightning never strikes twice in the same place

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)an unusual situation or event is unlikely to happen again in exactly the same circumstances or to the same person
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)罕见的事情不会在完全相同的情况下发生（或：奇异的事不会再次发生在同一个人身上）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: special use of lightening (verbal nounfrom lighten)

entry.def: Lightning is the very bright flashes of light in the sky that happen during thunderstorms.

example.ex: One man died when he was struck by lightning...
Another flash of lightning lit up the cave.
example.tran: 又一道闪电照亮了山洞。

entry.def: Lightning describes things that  happen very quickly or last for only a short time.

example.tran: 如今开车需要反应极其迅速。

means.word_mean: 1. abrupt electric discharge from cloud to cloud or from cloud to earth accompanied by the emission of light
2. the flash of light that accompanies an electric discharge in the atmosphere (or something resembling such a flash); can scintillate for a second or more

list.explanation: 行动快速或效率高的人或物

example.en: That little car is just like greased lightning.
example.zh: 那辆汽车虽小却能开得飞快。

example.en: That kid can run like greased lightning.
example.zh: 那小伙子能跑得像闪电一样快。

example.en: This greased lightning of yours nearly blew my head off.
example.zh: 你的这种烈性酒差点儿要把我的脑袋炸开了。

auth_sentence.content: Bolt has the Lightning Bolt, Farah the Mobot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bolt has the Lightning Bolt, Farah the Mobot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bolt has the Lightning Bolt, Farah the Mobot.

auth_sentence.content: They also stole the copper from the lightning rod.
auth_sentence.res_content: They also stole the copper from the lightning rod.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also stole the copper from the lightning rod.

auth_sentence.content: In a thunderstorm, lightning struck at a fair.
auth_sentence.res_content: In a thunderstorm, lightning struck at a fair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In a thunderstorm, lightning struck at a fair.

jushi.english: Since light travels faster than sound, lightning appears before thunder.
jushi.chinese: 由于光速比音速快,因而总是先看见闪电,后听见雷声。
